verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w What|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* bill \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w divorce|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*? \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w creditor|strong="H5383"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*: \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wicked \w deeds|strong="H5612"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*: \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w would|strong="H0376"\w* hear. \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w become|strong="H0887"\w* little, \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w cannot|strong="H0369"\w* redeem? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w dry|strong="H2717"\w* land: \w the|strong="H0935"\w* fishes \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* rot \w for|strong="H7121"\w* want \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* darkness, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* \w covering|strong="H3682"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w learned|strong="H3045"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* should \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* uphold \w by|strong="H1242"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w weary|strong="H3287"\w*: \w he|strong="H5414"\w* wakeneth \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* wakeneth \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* hath \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H0241"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* resist: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H3808"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* body \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* strikers, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w cheeks|strong="H3895"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* plucked \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* away \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* rebuked \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* spit upon \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* most hard rock, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*.

He \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* justifieth \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*? let \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w my|strong="H7378"\w* adversary? let \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w me|strong="H0398"\w*? \w Lo|strong="H2005"\w*, \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0398"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w a|strong="H0398"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w moth|strong="H6211"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* feareth \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* heareth \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w light|strong="H5051"\w*? \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w* hope \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* upon \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w kindle|strong="H6919"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, encompassed \w with|strong="H3027"\w* dames, walk \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w light|strong="H0217"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dames \w which|strong="H0784"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w kindled|strong="H6919"\w*: \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* sorrows.
